textBox.richText: Sorry - yeah I know. I have been a lazy bastard the last couple of months - regarding the blog update that is! My excuse is that I have been really busy with a lot of stuff. After I wrote last time my parents visited, Mette visited, I threw a small housewarming, My collaborator Phil Marshall visited from Santa Barbara, I had to prepare a poster for the upcoming IAU symposium in Rio, my parents ‘in law’ had 25th anniversary and I missed Mette (so I had to go to Denmark for a couple of weeks). I’m still pretty busy, so this entry will also be rather short. Well the as you can see I have have had plenty to do the last couple of months. I have tried to keep the pictures on my web gallery up to date (but have unfortunately failed that as well - even though is more up to date than the blog) so if you are curious the feel free to drop by there once in a while. I mention this since I will not be able to blog the next couple of weeks where I’m off to Rio de Janeiro for a conference and a week of vacation, but I will hopefully have time to upload some pictures. And they say that pictures speak a thousand words, so a gallery should as good (if not better) than my blog entries. I don’t think I have that much more to add this time... no not really. I just want to wish everyone a happy sommer (a bit late - I know) and then talk to you all in a couple of weeks. see yah! (The pictures are from a nice summer morning in DK - I was a bit bored, so played with my camera...)
